channel.title: CVE Feed for QuadLayers -- Perfect Brands for WooCommerce (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QuadLayers -- Perfect Brands for WooCommerce (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-23982|2024-08-03T03:59:23.351Z -- quadlayers -- perfect%20brands%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: The vulnerability discovered in WordPress Perfect Brands for WooCommerce plugin (versions <= 2.0.4) allows server information exposure.

item.title: CVE-2022-23981|2024-08-03T03:59:23.330Z -- quadlayers -- perfect%20brands%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: The vulnerability allows Subscriber+ level users to create brands in WordPress Perfect Brands for WooCommerce plugin (versions <= 2.0.4).
